type.description: Type of the product from the enum

updatedAt.description: Time when the product was last updated.

addedAt.description: Time when the product was added.

type.description: Type of the product from the enum

lineItemPrice.description: Price associated with the line item.

lineItemStrikethroughPrice.description: Price associated with the line item before applying program discount.

lineItemDeposit.description: Initial deposit associated with the line item.

lineItemTax.description: Tax associated with the line item.

lineItemTotalCharges.description: Total charges associated with the line item.

lineItemDiscount.description: Total discount associated with the line item.

lineItemBalance.description: Total balance associated with the line item.

adjustedItemSubtotal.description: Adjusted subtotal associated with the line item.

addOnsPrice.description: Price associated with the line item add ons.

addOnsTax.description: Tax associated with the line item add ons.

addOnsDeposit.description: Deposit associated with the line item add ons.

adjustedTripSubtotalWithAddOns.description: Adjusted trip subtotal inclusive of add-ons associated with the room type line item.

actualTripSubtotalWithAddOns.description: Room subtotal inclusive of add-ons before discount for the associated room type line item.

upsellAverageNightlyPriceDifference.description: Average nightly price difference between the originally selected item and the upsell item.

upsellRoomRateDifference.description: Room rate difference between the originally selected item and the upsell item.

upsellGrossRevenueDifference.description: Total reservation difference between the originally selected item and the upsell item.

bookEndDate.description: This is the last day that a reservation can be made using the room program.

contentVersion.description: Product data content version, this will help client to unmarshal the payload with specific schema

cartLineItemId.description: cart line item id, autogenerated by the system

packageLineItemId.description: If the cart line item belongs to a package, then this field contains the identifier of the instance of the package in the cart.

packageId.description: The identifier for the package configuration. It is used to pull the package configuration content data.

packageType.description: Type of the package. It indicates which types of items are required/contained in the the package.

productId.description: Product id, product specific id room type id for room, show id for show etc.

productName.description: Product name, product specific room name for room, show name for show etc.

priceExpiresAt.description: Time when the product will be expired in terms of pricing and availability. After this expiry product must be repriced

invalidAt.description: After this the product will be removed from cart

timeZone.description: Property time zone at Product level.

promoCode.description: PromoCode at Product level. this promo code is for GSE property

promo.description: PromoCode at Product level. this promo code is for ACRS property

isCheckoutEligible.description: Stores value of item's eligibility for checkout.

confirmationNumber.description: Stores value of item's confirmation num that is coming from the ACRS source system.

operaConfirmationNumber.description: Stores value of item's opera confirmation num that is coming from the Opera source system.

operaHotelCode.description: Stores value of item's opera hotel code from the ACRS source system.

enableJwb.description: Whether join while booking flow is required for this product.

itemSelectionDetails.description: These are the product specific fields.

paymentRequired.description: Stores the value of the item's payment requirement for checkout.

upsellAvailable.description: Defines if the item is an upsell eligible item

upgraded.description: Indicates if the item is upgraded or not

upsellLineItem.description: Stores the upsell line item info for upgrade and downgrade operations

updatedAt.description: Time when the product was last updated.

addedAt.description: Time when the product was added.

packageLineItemId.description: If the cart line item belongs to a package, then this field contains the identifier of the instance of the package in the cart.

packageId.description: The identifier for the package configuration. It is used to pull the package configuration content data.

packageType.description: Type of the package. It indicates which types of items are required/contained in the the package.

productId.description: Product id, product specific id room type id for room, show id for show etc.

productName.description: Product name, product specific room name for room, show name for show etc.

priceExpiresAt.description: Time when the product will be expired in terms of pricing and availability. After this expiry product must be repriced

invalidAt.description: After this the product will be removed from cart

timeZone.description: Property time zone at Product level.

promoCode.description: PromoCode at Product level. this promo code is for GSE property

promo.description: PromoCode at Product level. this promo code is for ACRS property

isCheckoutEligible.description: Stores value of item's eligibility for checkout.

confirmationNumber.description: Stores value of item's confirmation num that is coming from the ACRS source system.

operaConfirmationNumber.description: Stores value of item's opera confirmation num that is coming from the Opera source system.

operaHotelCode.description: Stores value of item's opera hotel code from the ACRS source system.

enableJwb.description: Whether join while booking flow is required for this product.

itemSelectionDetails.description: These are the product specific fields.

paymentRequired.description: Stores the value of the item's payment requirement for checkout.

upsellAvailable.description: Defines if the item is an upsell eligible item

upgraded.description: Indicates if the item is upgraded or not

roomSelectionDetails.description: These are the room specific fields.

showSelectionDetails.description: These are the show specific fields.

diningSelectionDetails.description: These are the dining specific fields.

partySize.description: Number of guests for the reservation

offerType.description: Offer Type of the line item

travelPeriodStartDate.description: This is the first day that can be booked with a room program.

travelPeriodEndDate.description: This is the last day that can be booked with a room program.

shoppedItineraryId.description: Stores value of item's shopped itinerary Id for GSE PO booked on the source system.

myVegasCode.description: Stores value of myVegas redeem code.

f1Package.description: The flag indicating if the program belongs to f1 Package.

roomSubtotal.description: Total of nightly base prices before discount

programDiscount.description: Amount of discount provided by the program. This could be zero when there's no discount and it could be negative if program raises prices as part of value-add.

discountedAveragePrice.description: Average of all discounted prices across all nights in the trip

roomRequestsTotal.description: Total price for all room requests selected by the user

resortFee.description: Resort fee without tax amount for the trip selected

resortFeePerNight.description: Average resort fee per night without tax amount

resortFeeAndTax.description: Resort fee and tax amount for the trip selected

roomChargeTax.description: Amount of tax on room charges

occupancyFee.description: Occupancy fee. Applicable only for borgata

tourismFee.description: Tourism fee. Applicable only for borgata

tourismFeeAndTax.description: Tourism fee with tax included. Applicable only for borgata

casinoSurcharge.description: Casino Surcharge. Applicable only for borgata

casinoSurchargeAndTax.description: Casino Surcharge with tax included. Applicable only for borgata

depositDue.description: Deposit amount to be paid to book the reservation

previousDeposit.description: Deposit paid during the reservation. This is applicable only for /v2/reservation/preview api.

changeInDeposit.description: Change in deposit amount from previous deposit. Negative value means it's refund. This is applicable only for /v2/reservation/preview api.

balanceUponCheckIn.description: Balance amount to be paid during check-in

offerType.description: Offer Type of the line item.

myVegasCode.description: Stores value of myVegas redeem code.

myVegasComp.description: The flag indicating if the charges are for MYVEGAS COMP.

hdePackage.description: The flag indicating if the charges are for HDE Package.

showTickets.description: All show ticket details booked for the associated event.

allDayEventShowTimeDetails.description: Show times range for this event only in case of all day events, calculated from show content.

showPaymentChargedTo.description: Offer Type of the line item.

priceCode.description: The price code associated with the ticket.

priceCodeDescription.description: The price code description associated with the ticket

ticketTypeCodeDescription.description: The ticket type description associated with the ticket

ticketTypeCode.description: The ticket type code associated with the ticket.

holdClass.description: The hold class associated with the ticket.

holdId.description:: The hold ID associated with the selected seats

basePrice.description: The base price for the ticket.

discountedPrice.description: The discounted price for the ticket.

accessible.description: Whether the ticket is for accessible seating

adaCompanion.description: Whether the ticket is for adaCompanion seating

seat.description: The nightly price breakdown for the add on.

deliveryFee.description: This is the delivery method fee.

let.description: This is the let(live entertainment tax).

serviceChargeFee.description: This is the service charge fee.

serviceChargeTax.description: This is the service charge tax.

serviceChargeFeeAndTax.description: This is the service charge fee and tax.

showSubtotal.description: This is the show reservation subtotal.

discountedSubtotal.description: This is the show reservation discounted subtotal.

reservationTotal.description: This is the show reservation total.

id.description: The id of the room component.

code.description: A code for the room component.

shortDescription.description: A short description of the add on.

longDescription.description: A long description of the add on.

active.description: Whether the add on is active at this time.

nonEditable.description: Whether the add on is editable.

selected.description: Whether the add on has been selected.

tripPrice.description: The price for the component for the full trip not including tax.

tripTax.description: The tax for the component for the full trip.

price.description: The price for the unit irrespecive of.

depositAmount.description: The upfront deposit amount for the component.

prices.description: The nightly price breakdown for the add on.

date.description: The night this price object refers to.

amount.description: The price of the add on for the given date.

tax.description: The tax of the add on for the given date.

cartId.description: Cart Id generated by the system

ttl.description: After this the cart will be considered as expired and eligible for deletion

priceExpiresAt.description: After this time the cart price will be considered as expired

roomTotals.description: Cart level room totals for all the room type products.

showTotals.description: Cart level show totals for all the room type products.

mgmId.description: Mgm Id associated with this cart

mlife.description: Mlife number associated with this cart

isCheckoutEligible.description: Stores value of cart's eligibility for checkout.

type.description: The type of the cart. Can be Global or Package.

hasPriceChanged.description: Marks whether cart's price has been changed after repricing the cart.

hasDepositDueChanged.description: Marks whether cart's deposit due amount has been changed after repricing the cart.

minHoldDuration.description: Minimum hold value across all products in the cart.

diningMaxCount.description: Max number of dining table allowed in the cart.

showMaxCount.description: Max number of show allowed in the cart.

roomMaxCount.description: Max number of room allowed in the cart.

repriced.description: Marks whether cart has been repriced.

enableJwb.description: Whether join while booking flow is required for this Cart.

jwbFlow.description: Flag to indicate if this cart was checked out as part of JWB flow.

isTimerExtended.description: Marks whether the cart timer has been extended.

paymentRequired.description: Marks if payment is required when checking out this cart.

perpetualOfferEligible.description: Marks whether it is perpetual offer eligible

totalCharge.description: Total charges of the all associated products including component charges within the cart

totalTax.description: Total taxes of the all associated products within the cart

totalPrice.description: Total price of the all associated products within the cart inclusive of all charges total and taxes total

totalStrikethroughPrice.description: Total price of the all associated products within the cart inclusive of all charges total and taxes total before applying program discount

totalDeposit.description: Total deposit due of the all associated products within the cart

totalDiscount.description: Total discount for the all associated products within the cart

totalBalance.description: Total balance at check in for the all associated products within the cart

totalAdjustedItemSubtotal.description: Total adjusted item subtotal for all line items.

totalItemsSubtotal.description: Total price of all nightly room rates excluding taxes, resort fees across all nights excluding taxes, base prices across all show items excluding taxes, and all add-ons selected

packageCategoryId.description: The identifier for the package category being used in Package 2.0 flow

packageName.description: PackageName is the name of the package

packageComponentDetails.description: The package room component inclusions for the selected package

packageBaseTotal.description: The starting price of the package. Read only field.

packageStartingPrice.description: The starting price of the package

packageTotal.description: The total price of the package

roomModification.description: The room modification price of the package

showModification.description: The show modification price of the package

roomTotal.description: The room total price of the package

showTotal.description: The show total price of the package

packageInclusions.description: The package inclusions for the selected package

isMultiDayEvent.description: Indicates if the show event in the package is a multi day event

eventEndDate.description: The show event end date is specified only for multi-date events

eventStartDate.description: The show event start date is specified only for multi-date events

cartId.description: Cart's Id generated by the system.

mgmId.description: Mgm Id associated with this cart

mlife.description: Mlife number associated with this cart

lineItemsMetadata.description: confirmation numbers associated with this cart.

numChkOutEligibleItems.description: gives the number of eligible items in the cart.

numTotalItems.description: gives the total number items in the cart.

isCheckoutEligible.description: Stores value of cart's eligibility for checkout.

isDiscounted.description: This attribute will be true if the price is less than basePrice.

itemType.description: Generic product types of the cart line items.

packageType.description: Generic package types of the cart line items.

cartType.description: Type of the cart, global, or specialized.

type.description: Type of the product from the enum

checkInCheckOutDates.description: checkIn dates and checkOut dates of the room items in the cart

items.description: checkIn date and checkOut date of a room item

checkInCheckOutDate.description: checkIn date and checkOut date of a room item in a cart

cartLineItemId.description: cart line item id to be updated

type.description: Type of the cart line item from the enum

productName.description: Product name, product specific room name for room, show name for show etc.

propertyTimeZone.description: Property time zone at Product level.

addOnIds.description: The AddOnId is Available Components Ids, It is required.

specialRequests.description: The Special Requests.It is not required.

deliveryMethodId.description: The id of the delivery method the customer wants to select

updateNewEvent.description: New show item to be updated

bookEndDate.description: This is the last day that a reservation can be made using the room program.

travelPeriodStartDate.description: This is the first day that can be booked with a room program.

travelPeriodEndDate.description: This is the last day that can be booked with a room program.

bookStartDate.description: This is the first day that a booking can be made using the show program.

bookEndDate.description: This is the last day that a booking can be made using the show program.

redeemStartDate.description: This is the first day that can be booked with a show program.

redeemEndDate.description: This is the last day that can be booked with a show program.

totalTourismFeeAndTax.description: Total Tourism Fee and Tax of the all associated products within the cart.

totalCasinoSurchargeAndTax.description: Total Casino Surcharge and Tax of the all associated products within the cart.

totalResortFeePerNight.description: Total Resort Fee Per Night of the all associated products within the cart.

totalOccupancyFee.description: Total Occupancy Fee of the all associated products within the cart inclusive of all charges total and taxes total.

totalResortFeeAndTax.description: Total Resort Fee and Tax deposit due of the all associated products within the cart.

totalTripSubtotal.description: Total of sum of room trip subtotal only (i.e. no addon cost).

totalPrice.description: Sum of line item price for room line items.

totalRoomChargeTax.description: Total room charge tax for room line items.

totalAdjustedItemSubtotal.description: Total adjusted item subtotal for room line items.

totalDeliveryFee.description: Total Delivery fee for show line items.

totalGratuity.description: Total Gratuity for show line items.

totalLet.description: Total let(live entertainment tax) for show line items.

totalServiceChargeFee.description: Total Service charge fee for show line items.

totalServiceChargeTax.description: Total Service charge tax for show line items.

totalTransactionFee.description: Total Transaction fee for show line items.

totalTransactionTax.description: Total Transaction tax for show line items.

totalPrice.description: Sum of line item price for show line items.

totalServiceChargeFeeAndTax.description: Total service charge fee and tax for show line items.

totalAdjustedItemSubtotal.description: Total adjusted item subtotal for show line items.

selected.description: Whether the delivery method has been selected.

id.description: The id of the delivery method.

code.description: A code for the delivery method.

name.description: A name of the delivery method.

description.description: A description of the delivery method.

active.description: Whether the delivery method is active at this time.

defaultDeliveryMethod.description: Whether the delivery method is the default delivery method.

ePrinting.description: Whether the ticket can be printed by the customer via email/mobile

amount.description: The price for the delivery method.

packageId.description: The identifier for the package being used in Package 1.0 flow

packageLineItemId.description: The identifier of the instance of the package in the cart.

packageCategoryId.description: The identifier for the package category being used in Package 2.0 flow

updateNewEvent.description: New dining item that contains a new reservation date/time
